messages.title: Building a stronger economy and a fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £800 tax cut for 24m workers, aiming to build a stronger economy.
Providing an extra £2.5bn for struggling school kids to improve education.
Protecting from cradle to college, commitment to finding the £8 billion Britain's NHS needs by 2020.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Carl Minns' Lib Dems are in second place here. 'It’s Carl or the Conservatives in the General Election here in Haltemprice & Howden' suggesting tactical voting

issues.economy: £800 tax cut for 24m workers, aiming to build a stronger economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Carl has a proven track record - having led Hull City Council from being officially the worst in the UK to officially the most improved and helping to bring Siemens to East Yorkshire.

politicalExperience.role: Former Leader of Hull City Council
politicalExperience.achievements: Led Hull City Council from being officially the worst in the UK to officially the most improved.
